group_1.textRight: Magical Girl powers sure are convenient.

group_1.textLeft: So anyway, Kako, what was@it you wanted to show me?

group_1.textRight: Look up.

group_1.textLeft: Whoa!@[chara:200100:cheek_1]The sky is full of stars! It's...[chara:200100:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]gorgeous...

group_1.textRight: Madoka, did you know?
Tonight is the perfect night for stargazing.@The stars are clearer than any other night.
I admit...
I don't know much about celestial bodies,@or even scientific things in general...
I actually read that tonight was@perfect for stargazing in that book.
Yes.
So I chose the place with the@best view in all of Kamihama.
Some place high...
With no other tall buildings or bright@lights to get in the way of the view...
A place where you could watch the stars@peacefully, without any distractions.
That's why I wanted to bring you here,@on this night, to this specific place.
So I could show you the stars at their best.
It means so much to me...@That you enjoyed this.
I...hide away from the world a lot.@I'm not good at talking to others...
I'm so bad at it that I feel lonely@all the time and get depressed...
But when I'm with you, Madoka...@[chara:301100:motion_400:cheek_1]I can deal with it somehow.
With you, the words just flow out of me...@[chara:301100:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]It's really fun talking to you...
I just...[chara:301100:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]really wanted to say, "Thank you,"@and let you know how much it meant to me...
What...?

group_1.textLeft: I want to be friends with everyone.@But there are things that get in the way.
Some people are really mean@to me, [chara:200100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]and I get depressed.
It's no good to be too scared to get @close to someone.
If you tell people how you feel, your @words will definitely get through to them.
Just like I heard your message to me.
Your feelings came through loud and clear.

group_1.textRight: Madoka...thank you.
Madoka, you really are...@[chara:301100:motion_1]Extremely kind and nice...
I'm going to do my best not to@be too scared to talk to people.

group_1.textLeft: I know you'll be just fine!@After all, you were able to show me this.
This incredible starry night sky.@It's such a lovely present!

group_1.textRight: You're welcome...!

group_1.narration: I made a wonderful friend that@night under the starry night sky.
